website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced wooden skimboard that works well for children and teens.
pros: This basic wooden skimboard is available in a variety of designs and is an ideal board for a first-time skimmer
While its surface is slippery and may require wax, this board is well suited to skimming along the shore in shallow water
cons: A few customers reported that the resin split after moderate use

customer_reviews.title: Does not float
customer_reviews.text: My own fault for not asking first if it floats . I wanted a board for my 5 lb. dog in the pool, googled boogie board and this appeared. Read the words; beach , water and thought perfect. Let me just say not all wood floats. I thought it did . cannot return because threw the box away. Or maybe I can. Too bad she loves the water.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara VanDusen

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner board
customer_reviews.text: I got this board for my teenage nephew. It was first time using a skim board and it turned out to be a great beginner board. By the end of the week of riding on the sand there was a little wear on the bottom, but nothing that would impede his riding. I recommend waxing the top for better grip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Split in the first 10 minutes of riding it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this skim board for my 12 year old son for Christmas, he took it to the beach for the first time last weekend. It split within the first 10 minutes of riding it. Because we bought it in December and it is sold by Amazon, how do we get a replacement or refund?
customer_reviews.author: audaiken

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap skim board. Does exactly what it is intended to do. Threw some wax on it and works great out on the beach. I camp quite often on the beach in Olympic National Park and it really brings a great time to the beach
customer_reviews.author: flowin313

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old loves
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a skim board for my son when we went on vacation. He is 8 and this seems slightly heavy but he still manages to use it. Takes a lot of practice. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Split durung first use
customer_reviews.text: My grandson used the board for the first time and the board split on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the price, be sure to buy wax or you'll slide right off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Slide and Ride!
customer_reviews.text: great starter board- nice art work. need a very sandy beach. Mahalo
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Get fiberglass, not wood
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. We were so disappointed with this board at the beach. It stuck in the sand like glue. It was worth the splurge to pay for fiberglass and have something that would glide on top of the water.
customer_reviews.author: J Bott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this. Seems like food quality. Son loves it
customer_reviews.author: sam kem

customer_reviews.title: Greast product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the board - great quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: quality gal

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it and is getting good on it but the paint has almost all but ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and is getting good on it but the paint has almost all but chipped off :(
customer_reviews.author: Justthegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but at the nose of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but at the nose of the board the plywood has stared to break apart after just one week at the beach. I would not recommend this for someone who regularly skim-boards but for someone who goes every other year I think it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mattking911

customer_reviews.title: Display Only
customer_reviews.text: Bought for display. Wouldn't use near water. Lol. Maybe young kids?
customer_reviews.author: Gosnow

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for our yearly Cape trips and my kids love them. The wood is nice and smooth and well made and the graphics are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good board for person under 150lbs
customer_reviews.text: Board was a good price, with cool Canadianesque design. Board had minor imperfections. Board made in China. Boars is to small for me, I am 80kg. Overall happy with the board. Board needs wax for sure, cannot use without.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking board. Threw it on a thin layer of water (several times) and it didn't slide over the water very well and then my son jumped on and it stuck on the sand. We tried several times while on vacation in Cannon Beach. Due to that I am rating it a 3 because it may have been the users as this is our first skim board. Very sad it didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Neyhart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This wooden one was a little harder to catch the waves then the other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Eaton603

customer_reviews.title: Board is sturdy and he's had lots of fun using it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 16th birthday. He enjoys using at the lake or in a nearby creek since we don't leave near a beach. Board is sturdy and he's had lots of fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Into Infinty
customer_reviews.text: My First skimboard. I will probably just hang this up because it is so beautiful as a work of art. [...]
customer_reviews.author: bar

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last at all. Took it on vacation and ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last at all. Took it on vacation and on the second day, the wood began to separate.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this Board!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap board..My son used for two days at the beach and already de-laminating and splintering. Paid $50 for a cheap quality board. don't make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Check the sides before using it
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but came with openings on the sides which can potentially allow water to get in and waterlog it (this would not let the board skim on the water as effectively anymore).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: First time my son used it. It split at the front end. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: and he loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my nephew, age 10, and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jmw

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful board, seems solid
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, our kids and parents are new to skim boarding. It's a beautiful board, seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: NewEngland

customer_reviews.title: Board is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This board is much too heavy. We tried to use it n it just buried itself into the sound due to being overweight
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves his board. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: linda shaw

customer_reviews.title: Looks good too
customer_reviews.text: It held up well to a lot of use by an 85 lber and limited use by a 200 lber... Looks good too
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This skim board was a grad. present for my daughter. She loves it, very good looking and good quality. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Brighto

customer_reviews.title: As others have described, the edge was not well ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have described, the edge was not well sealed and finished. Mine also arrived significantly warped so will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Horn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful...excellent quality..just make sure you wax for it helps those slippery toes
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Grebin

customer_reviews.title: Skimboard is great but isn't the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. However, board was painted white. I really wanted the wood grain finish in the picture. Still fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: FLbass

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not real impressed they are kinda worped but they worked ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boards! My husband and child are thrilled to use them at the beach this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Good Flatland Board
customer_reviews.text: I used this board for flatland skimming for a week. This is the kind of board is used in about an inch of water usually at low tide. Even though it is not the omnidirectional type, it still can be ridden backward. I could have rented a similar board at a surf shop for a week for about half what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Ward

customer_reviews.title: Poor product quality.
customer_reviews.text: Received item promptly. Removed from box and board appeared exactly as in photos. However, upon close inspection, found edge not properly sealed. The part that was not sealed already showed signs of delamination.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, but doesn't match photos
customer_reviews.text: This board is nice, but it is white. The photos depict a natural wood looking board. There is no wood grain on the boards I received. Somewhat disappointing. Haven't used the board yet. Will give it a test run in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: WATER LOGGED LIKE CRAZY
customer_reviews.text: It gets water logged real easily but the design is really nice and good sized but wow gets water logged way too easily really hard to get the water out and would suck even more if you don't get traction pads (but I got traction pads so at least there's that. Rides well if not water logged.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Board, however not very functional. The nose of the board does not have the curvature needed to keep the nose from burying into the sand. Unable to use and had to purchase another while on vacation. Looks good as wall art only.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Sales

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my teens, well made. The only problem is my son is reluctant to use it because it is surprisingly beautiful and he's considering using it as room decoration.
customer_reviews.author: SueS. in Massachusetts

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: grandkids like it. Guess it holds up to their abuse.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach accessory for our son
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these skin boards for our sons... Very high quality craftsmanship ( smooth wood, non toxic lacquer & Nice artwork) Our son loved playing with them all summer long. We were even able to travel (pack for flying) with them for our summer beach vacation. We will have them for years to come
customer_reviews.author: B.Gief

customer_reviews.title: It looks great the paint job is nice the finishes nice great ...
customer_reviews.text: I am basing this review off of the product itself having not used it and we will not be using For at least 2 months. It looks great the paint job is nice the finishes nice great product for the money and has 1" of Rocker on the nose and none on the tail. It looks like a great product for the money and I'm going to even buy a second one without even trying this first one
customer_reviews.author: jassem815

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the board!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking board! Looks amazing -- better than the photo. The best deal out there. I priced the boards on several sites.
customer_reviews.author: ajf

customer_reviews.title: my son has enjoyed. it came in a little damaged on the ...
customer_reviews.text: my son has enjoyed. it came in a little damaged on the end from shipping but we filed it down so it didnt peel up any further and just refinished the edge.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly, but only needed it for a chill ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke quickly, but only needed it for a chill week out on the cape with beer, booze, and babes. When the ladies saw my ripping the wave on this thing, they couldn't resist me. Only buy this if you want to skim hard for a weeks time if you're a serious skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... big for my 8 year old but it was perfect size and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would be too big for my 8 year old but it was perfect size and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: It rides perfectly and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this board is exactly what I was looking for. It rides perfectly and a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Richling

customer_reviews.title: Great look.  Good wood finish.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Bought the small one first then the larger size. Grandkids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hammond

product_meta.title: Lucky Bums Wood Skimboard
product_meta.description: Enjoy hours of fun with the Lucky Bums Skimboard at the beach, bay, on the sandbar at the river, or in the surf. The traditional rocker nose helps prevent face plants and makes learning to skimboard a breeze whether you are an adult or a kid. The durable plywood and epoxy construction of this mid-size board gives beginning riders a good base to learn foot placement and improve skills. Enjoy a fun day at the beach making friends and skimming across the sand.
feature_bullets: High quality materials - Including durable epoxy plywood construction with a high gloss coating to prevent water damage and breakage

Perfect for beginners and experts alike - With the mid-sized body anyone can use this board to learn or perfect their moves on. You’ll be gliding around on the sand with ease, thanks to the stable and maneuverable design.
Great for flatland - Skimming on the sand with a slight rocker shape to prevent nose dives.
Multiple designs to choose from - Featuring Clubs, Eagle, Manta Ray, Tattoo, or the Wave!
Satisfaction : If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, let us know. We’re here for our customers and will respond promptly and professionally in order to fix any problems you may have.
